trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>s.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>s.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref> class that takes an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""> </xref> classe che accetta un <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `Count` already equals the capacity, the capacity of list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added.
trans-unit.target: Se `Count` già pari alla capacità, la capacità dell'elenco viene raddoppiata tramite la riallocazione della matrice interna e copia gli elementi esistenti nella nuova matrice prima che il nuovo elemento viene aggiunto automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: If `Count` is less than the capacity, this method is an 0(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Se `Count` è minore della capacità, questo metodo è un'operazione di 0 (1).

trans-unit.source: If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an 0(n) operation, where n is `Count`.
trans-unit.target: Se la capacità deve essere incrementata per far posto al nuovo elemento, questo metodo diventa un'operazione di 0(n), dove n è `Count`.

trans-unit.source: The Add method expects only <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal> and its derived types (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine>) as parameters.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Add prevede solo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal>e i tipi derivati (<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude>, e <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine>) come parametri.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal>

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates adding an included schema to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Includes%2A> collection of an existing <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrata l'aggiunta di uno schema incluso per la <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Includes%2A>raccolta di un oggetto esistente <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>oggetto.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Includes%2A>

source.ph: ```vb# Dim schema As XmlSchema = New XmlSchema() Dim textReader As XmlTextReader = New XmlTextReader("include.xsd") Dim includeSchema As XmlSchema = XmlSchema.Read(textReader, null) Dim include As XmlSchemaInclude = New XmlSchemaInclude() include.Schema = includeSchema; schema.Includes.Add(include); ```

```c# XmlSchema schema = new XmlSchema(); XmlTextReader textReader = new XmlTextReader("include.xsd"); XmlSchema includeSchema = XmlSchema.Read(textReader, null); XmlSchemaInclude include = new XmlSchemaInclude(); include.Schema = includeSchema; schema.Includes.Add(include); ```

target.ph: ```vb# Dim schema As XmlSchema = New XmlSchema() Dim textReader As XmlTextReader = New XmlTextReader("include.xsd") Dim includeSchema As XmlSchema = XmlSchema.Read(textReader, null) Dim include As XmlSchemaInclude = New XmlSchemaInclude() include.Schema = includeSchema; schema.Includes.Add(include); ```

```c# XmlSchema schema = new XmlSchema(); XmlTextReader textReader = new XmlTextReader("include.xsd"); XmlSchema includeSchema = XmlSchema.Read(textReader, null); XmlSchemaInclude include = new XmlSchemaInclude(); include.Schema = includeSchema; schema.Includes.Add(include); ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the item has been added.
trans-unit.target: Indice in corrispondenza del quale è stato aggiunto l'elemento.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than .
trans-unit.target: - oppure - index è maggiore di .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> parameter specified is not of type <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal"></xref> or its derived types <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> parametro specificato non è di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaExternal"> </xref> o dei tipi derivati <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaImport"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInclude"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> is in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> è il <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified qualified name is in the collection; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il nome completo specificato nella raccolta. in caso contrario, restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If null is supplied, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is returned because there is no qualified name with a null name.
trans-unit.target: Se si specifica null, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> viene restituito perché non esiste alcun nome completo con un nome null.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>s from the collection into the given array, starting at the given index.
trans-unit.target: Copia tutti i <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>s dalla raccolta in una matrice specificata, a partire dall'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: La matrice specificata deve essere di un tipo compatibile.

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A> to copy the elements.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo utilizza <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>per copiare gli elementi.</xref:System.Array.Copy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dall'oggetto di <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero nella matrice da cui iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: arrayè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di origine <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> non può essere eseguire automaticamente il cast al tipo della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for iterating through the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjects" name="XmlSchemaObjects" href=""></xref> contained in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore per scorrere il <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjects" name="XmlSchemaObjects" href=""> </xref> contenuti nel <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The iterator returns <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectEnumerator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'iteratore <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectEnumerator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection index corresponding to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice di raccolta corrispondente al valore <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> whose index you want to return.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> cui si desidera restituire l'indice.

trans-unit.source: The index corresponding to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice corrispondente al valore <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inserts an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `Count` already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Se `Count` già pari alla capacità, la capacità dell'elenco viene raddoppiata automaticamente mediante la riallocazione della matrice interna prima che venga inserito il nuovo elemento.

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to `Count`, `value` is added to the end of `XmlSchemaObjectCollection`.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è uguale a `Count`, `value` viene aggiunto alla fine di `XmlSchemaObjectCollection`.

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi successivi al punto di inserimento spostati verso il basso per inserire il nuovo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which an item should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale deve essere inserito un elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than .
trans-unit.target: - oppure - index è maggiore di .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnClear" name="OnClear" href=""></xref>viene richiamata prima lo standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Clear" name="Clear" href=""> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.target: L'elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnSet" name="OnSet" href=""></xref> is invoked before the standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Set" name="Set" href=""></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnSet" name="OnSet" href=""></xref>viene richiamata prima lo standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Set" name="Set" href=""> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.target: L'indice di <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The old value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore precedente.

trans-unit.source: The new value.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo valore.

trans-unit.source: Removes an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> dal <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObjectCollection" name="XmlSchemaObjectCollection" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue una ricerca lineare. Pertanto, il tempo medio di esecuzione è proporzionale al <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è un'operazione O (`n`) operazione, in cui `n` è <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo determina l'uguaglianza chiamando <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi che seguono l'elemento rimosso spostato in alto occupare la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> da rimuovere.
